page.title: 03The Domesday Flight
page.content: cricketers were just white dots on green paper. We saw{Charterhouse}which looked very beautiful, just like the old French castles. At last we saw our school, it looked very different from above, we could see the new block quite well, the fifth year block, the swimming pool and even a few after school tennis players, who although we could not see it, waved to us. We flew back on a slightly different route and saw{Guildford Cathedral.}The flight went very quickly and before we knew it we had circled the runway and landed. We thanked the pilot for a very enjoyable afternoon that was an experience to remember. From the flight I realised just how fortunate we are to live in an area with so much countryside. In our study area there is much woodland, heathland, farmland and land controlled by the{National}
